name: Sully
description:
Traverse through an unknown planet as Captain Mark Sullivan. Sully, as he is affectionately know, must discover the mystery of this planet and how he got there.

Can you piece together the mystery?

This is my first full game. It has a lot of character and hours put into this game and I would love your constructive feedback! Please feel free to email me: 

thesuiterbusiness@gmail.com
